name: MKMapView.CameraBoundary
desc: A boundary of an area within which the map's center must remain.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Create a camera boundary using the provided coder.

items.name: init?(coordinateRegion: MKCoordinateRegion)
items.desc: Create a camera boundary using the provided coordinate region.

items.name: init?(mapRect: MKMapRect)
items.desc: Create a camera boundary using the provided map rectangle.

items.name: var mapRect: MKMapRect
items.desc: The map rectangle that describes the camera boundary.

items.name: var region: MKCoordinateRegion
items.desc: The coordinate region that describes the camera boundary.
